echo:
res.json({
    'method': req.method,
    'path': req.path,
    'headers': req.headers,
    'query': req.query,
    'body': req.body
  })
error500:
res.status(500).json({
    'method': req.method,
    'path': req.path,
    'headers': req.headers,
    'query': req.query,
    'body': req.body
  })
